data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Jawa Timur. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jawa Timur, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Jawa Timur, Indonesia to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Jawa Timur, Indonesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Jawa Timur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Kangean people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 19,698,475, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Jawa Timur, Indonesia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jawa Timur, Indonesia has a population of 22,200,200.

We estimate Jawa Timur has 712,273 people who might know Jesus, 1,789,452 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,698,475 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Jawa Timur, Indonesia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
